video_prompt: **Prompt:** A wooden boardwalk curves through a vibrant landscape. Pink petals cascade from blooming trees, drifting onto the path and surrounding rocks. The petals settle softly, creating a moving carpet of color. A wooden fence guides the eye through the evolving floral tunnel.
image_prompt: Full vertical shot of a winding dark wooden boardwalk covered in fallen pink petals, bordered by large grey rocks and a wooden fence. Above, a dense canopy of trees explodes with brilliant pink blossoms, creating a floral tunnel effect. In the background, hazy blue-green mountains. Soft, diffused lighting highlights the serene, vibrant spring landscape.
refined_video_prompt: Pink petals continuously shower from blooming trees, drifting and settling gently onto the path and rocks. They accumulate, forming a shifting, vibrant carpet of color. The floral environment constantly alters around the path as petals fall and gather, creating an ever-changing tunnel.
